name.namePart: Ascribed to McPherson & Oliver, Baton Rouge

mods.abstract: The Union fleet off the coaling yard at Baton Rouge in the summer of 1862Farragut needed the coal he found here to keep his larger vessels operating[East, "Civil War Album," text, p22; image, p23.]
